name: RoboVDino (itch)
description:
Throw Garbage At Dinosaurs! RoboVDino is 1-5 player cooperative carnage!

Take control of FILO, the unreasonably angry robot, pick up trash, throw it at Dinos, and throw the Dinos into the goal before they wake up.

Dinosaur habitats like the Dino-Shore, RAWRcade, and Stock Rex-change will test your skills in single player, or plug in up to 4 more controllers for 5 player coop action!

RoboVDino is an all ages party game with intense arcade action.
